General.Name: Element Lifestyle Retirement Inc
General.Description: Element Lifestyle Retirement Inc. develops and operates senior retirement communities in Canada. It provides development consulting and project management services. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
